official_title: To suspend temporarily the duty on a certain chemical.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2002, the duty on triethyleneglycol bis(2-ethyl hexanoate).

titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on a certain chemical.
